column1: I heard that there’s a person from the Outside World has arrived in this area.
I wonder what will it looks like?
Ah? Could that person over there be…
How are you?
What the!?
A youkai with the ability to camouflage?
Are you planning on a surprise attack?
Actually no.
I’m just here to…
It seems Gensokyo really is a very dangerous place.
I said no!
I only heard that there’s a person from the Outside World has arrived in this area,
that’s why I rushed over.
Oh?
It seems the folks in Gensokyo is very curious about the Outside World.
With that said, I’m sure you’ve prepared all kinds of danmaku too!
Well, how about this?
If you win, then I’ll bring you to the Outside World.
That’s great!
Actually, I'm curious about something else too.
I wonder what blood color does the people in the Outside World possess? Is it red?
What!?
Let’s conduct an experiment after I defeat you.
This fellow is extremely dangerous.
Prepare yourself for a danmaku duel!
Against a cold-blooded youkai?
Well then, I will use only a quarter of my strength,
and frost you under this deep snow for eternity!
